timeline.message: Add lucene builder interface and term query impl
Add lucene query interface and term query impl
Add more UT for range query
Only push down filter close to relation

timeline.bodyText: could you add doc for this limitation?
timeline.author: penghuo

replies.bodyText:
Good idea! Added a limitation folder with a single doc for now. Copy-pasted the up-to-date content from ODFE doc. Will make it doctest with example in explain API PR. Thanks!

MySQL reference: https://dev.mysql.com/doc/mysql-reslimits-excerpt/8.0/en/
ODFE doc: https://opendistro.github.io/for-elasticsearch-docs/docs/sql/limitation/
New limitation doc: https://github.com/dai-chen/sql/blob/lucene-pushdown-optimization/docs/user/limitations/limitations.rst
replies.author: dai-chen
